item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 20, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FOSS infrastructure is under attack by AI companies (75 points | 30 comments)
2. Powers of 2 with all even digits (43 points | 15 comments)
3. Dutch Parliament: Time to ditch US tech for homegrown options (233 points | 146 comments)
4. Building and deploying a custom site using GitHub Actions and GitHub Pages (17 points | 1 comment)

6. Tourist in US chained 'like Hannibal Lecter' (41 points | 10 comments)
7. How I accepted myself into Canada's largest AI hackathon (156 points | 60 comments)
8. 'Dark oxygen': a deep-sea discovery that has split scientists (34 points | 23 comments)
9. Sieve (YC W22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build the Future of Video AI ( | hide)
10. Compound File Binary Format (12 points | discuss)
11. Austral: A Systems Language with Linear Types and Capabilities (2022) (96 points | 13 comments)

13. How fast the days are getting longer (2023) (550 points | 190 comments)

15. Diagrams AI can, and cannot, generate (108 points | 20 comments)

18. Greenpeace must pay over $660M in case over Dakota Access protest activities (9 points | discuss)
19. Show HN: I built a MCP server so Claude can play Minesweeper (32 points | 11 comments)
20. AI Blindspots – Blindspots in LLMs I've noticed while AI coding (470 points | 182 comments)
21. LLM Agents Are Simply Graph – Tutorial for Dummies (199 points | 67 comments)
22. The Front End Treadmill (64 points | 62 comments)
23. Introduction to Deep Learning (CMU) (140 points | 22 comments)
24. DESI Opens Access to the Largest 3D Map of the Universe Yet (111 points | 8 comments)
25. Silicon Labs Shrinks Wireless SoCs to Extend BLE to Miniature Devices (55 points | 13 comments)
26. Muons used to test the condition of a road bridge in Estonia (200 points | 37 comments)
27. The Shitthropocene – Patagonia (7 points | discuss)

29. Orpheus-3B – Emotive TTS by Canopy Labs (130 points | 28 comments)
30. Restoring Faith: Crete's Ancient Minoan Civilisation (2009) (24 points | 4 comments)
